name: The Car (Knight2fox)
description:
LESS IS MORE

follow the car on the screen thats all you gotta do , you do not need to drive the car just keep it in your sight. also ensure that the fuel does not run out and you get to make as much score as possible :)

Controls :- WSAD to move the Camera / Arrow keys on the keyboard

P.S. :- to everyone who enjoyed this A new version is on its way after the JAM ends also for Android
